parameters.name: prompt
prompt
parameters.value:
Create a compliance-focused landing page for this legal compliance lead magnet:

Title: {{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.title }}
Value: {{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.value }}
Pain Point: {{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.pain_point }}
Angle: {{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.angle }}

Create HTML/CSS landing page with:
1. Protection-focused headline about legal safety and lawsuit prevention
2. Interactive legal risk assessment or compliance checker
3. Before/after scenarios showing legal protection benefits
4. Bullet points of included legal resources and templates
5. Case studies with actual lawsuit prevention stories
6. Urgency around changing laws and compliance deadlines
7. Email capture form with FIRST NAME, LAST NAME, and biggest legal concern
8. Trust signals (legal expertise, professional credentials)
9. Mobile-responsive design with professional legal imagery
10. Exclusive legal resources and professional access

Emphasize specific legal protection and lawsuit prevention. Use legal terminology appropriately. Include legal horror stories and compliance success stories. Make it feel like professional legal guidance.

parameters.fileName: /home/user/tenantflow-content/lead-magnets/{{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.folderPath }}/{{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.id }}.md
/home/user/tenantflow-content/landing-pages/{{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.folderPath }}/{{ $('Select Legal Compliance Topic').item.json.id }}-landing.html

meta.description: Creates legal compliance lead magnets every 14 days - specialized in landlord legal requirements and risk prevention
